value.name: Police arrest 4 suspects in deadly shooting at Wichita apartment complex
value.description: Before midnight, a Wichita police officer was near the Twin Rivers Apartments complex at 2303 Somerset St. It’s there where he heard gunshots and saw a vehicle speed away.

value.name: Neighbors react to violence at apartment complex
value.description: Four people have been arrested in connection with a deadly shooting late Monday night at an apartment complex in northwest Wichita killing 22-year-old Jose Covarrubias.

video.name: Neighbors react to violence at apartment complex

value.name: 4 people, including 2 teens, arrested in connection to fatal shooting in NW Wichita
value.description: Wichita Police have arrested four people in a fatal shooting that occurred during an illegal drug transaction Monday night. Police said 22-year-old Jose Covarrubias was shot and killed in the 1600 block of West 22nd Street North by a 16-year-old male when a physical disturbance occurred during an illegal drug deal.

value.name: 4 suspects arrested after man shot to death in Wichita
value.description: Four people have been arrested in the shooting death of a 22-year-old man in Wichita, police said. Officers found Jose Covarrubias dead at the Twin Rivers Apartment Complex late Monday. He was shot after a fight broke out with the four suspects during a drug deal,

value.name: 16-year-old among 4 jailed for another Kan. drug deal killing
value.description: Police stopped the vehicle and arrested 22-year-old Luis Martinez, 18-year-old Nicholas Olmos, 20-year-old Jaylon Pete and a 16-year-old boy. Witnesses in the area told police they saw the SUV in the vicinity near the time of the shooting.

value.description: Ricardo Arce, 40, of Chaparral, and Vicki Sowell, 35, of El Paso, Texas, were arrested on April 28 and charged in federal court for hostage taking.

value.description: Police say four people are under arrest after the shooting death of Wichita a man. Police Capt. Jason Stephens said Jose Covarrubias, 22, died after being shot late Monday at an apartment complex.

value.description: The District of New Mexico United States Attorney’s Office reports that three people have been charged in federal court with hostage-taking in Chaparral, New Mexico.

value.name: Four arrested, ages 16 to 22, after fatal shooting in north Wichita drug deal
value.description: Four people, ages 16 to 22, were arrested after a fatal shooting during a drug deal Monday night at an apartment complex in north Wichita, according to Wichita police spokesperson Charley Davidson.
